name: Slime Slayer (itch) (AstralTurtle)
description:
Your parents left you a legendary sword! Unfortunately, your still a level one adventurer...and the sword only kills slimes.

Still, your gonna make a name for yourself! As, the Slime Slayer!

-Arrow Keys/WASD to move

-Your sword follows mouse pointer.

-Left click/ Left Ctrl to shoot a slime bomb.

-The goal is to kill as many slimes as possible before one reaches you.

-The more Slimes you kill, the bigger and heavier your sword gets.

-You can use your absorbed slimes to fire slime bombs.
